Line: 23
Quote: "comparing the speed of a ball out of a baseball pitchers hand compared to its speed crossing crossing the plate"

[/FINDING]

Severity: major
Line: 27
Quote: "Look at this data (again convenience sampled from googling 'scatter plot') of this:"
Issue: Sentence ends with "of this:" but provides no completion, making it unclear what the data represents.
[/FINDING]

[FINDING]
Category: clarity_issue
Severity: minor
Line: 15
Quote: "Maybe although having a faster serve is better all things being equal, but focusing too heavily on one's serve counterproductively neglects other areas of one's game."
Issue: Awkward sentence structure with "Maybe although" followed by "but" creates confusion. Should be restructured for clarity.
[/FINDING]

[FINDING]
Category: clarity_issue
Severity: major
Line: 75
Quote: "Grant a factor correlated with an outcome, which we represent with two vectors at an angle theta, the inverse cosine equal the R-squared."
Issue: Missing verb and awkward phrasing makes this sentence difficult to parse. Should clarify the relationship between inverse cosine and R-squared.
[/FINDING]

[FINDING]
Category: clarity_issue
Severity: minor
Line: 75
Quote: "'Reading off the expected outcome given a factor score is just moving along the factor vector and multiplying by cosine theta to get the distance along the outcome vector."
Issue: Starting a sentence with a quoted phrase ('Reading off) is awkward and unclear.
[/FINDING]

[FINDING]
Category: clarity_issue
Severity: major
Line: 57
Quote: "So, [_ceteris paribus_](/lw/km6/why_the_tails_come_apart/b8ph), being more intelligent will make one richer"
Issue: Latin term "ceteris paribus" with no explanation provided, and it's formatted as a link which adds confusion about whether it's meant to be explanatory.
[/FINDING]

[FINDING]
Category: clarity_issue
Severity: minor
Line: 83
Quote: "There may be spread betting or portfolio scenarios where this factor comes into play - perhaps instead of funding AMF to diminishing returns when its marginal effectiveness dips below charity #2, we should be willing to spread funds sooner.(6)"
Issue: Uses acronym "AMF" without prior definition, making it unclear for readers unfamiliar with this charity.
[/FINDING]

[FINDING]
Category: clarity_issue
Severity: major
Line: 89
Quote: "I'm pretty sure this can be weakened: all that is needed, by the lights of my graphical intuition, is that the envelope be _concave_."
Issue: The phrase "by the lights of my graphical intuition" is unnecessarily convoluted and unclear.
[/FINDING]

[FINDING]
Category: clarity_issue
Severity: minor
Line: 99
Quote: "Another intuitive dividend is that this makes it clear why you can by R-squared to move between z-scores"
Issue: Missing verb - should be "multiply by R-squared" or similar. The omission makes the sentence confusing.
[/FINDING]

Category: clarity_issue
Severity: minor

Quote: "the tallest aren't the heaviest, the smartest parents don't have the smartest children, the fastest runners aren't the best footballers, etc. etc."
